info.name: Foodbank API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for Foodbank application with all essential endpoints including Restaurant Order Management workflows. Features role-based order updates: Customers can cancel, Restaurant Owners can manage full order lifecycle (Accept ‚Üí Process ‚Üí On the Way ‚Üí Complete).
